# OCR-Extraction.com - Free Online OCR Tool

> OCR-Extraction is a 100% free, browser-based OCR tool that converts images, scanned PDFs, and screenshots into editable text, Excel, and Word formats.

## Why use OCR-Extraction.com?
- **100% Free & Unlimited**: No hidden fees, no credit card required, and no daily limits.
- **No Sign-up Required**: Start extracting text instantly without creating an account.
- **Privacy-First**: Files are processed securely and deleted automatically. No data mining.
- **Top-Tier Accuracy**: Uses advanced AI to match or exceed paid enterprise tools.

## Supported Formats
- **Input**: JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, WEBP, HEIC, PDF (Scanned & Native).
- **Output**: Text (.txt), Excel (.xlsx), Word (.docx), JSON, Searchable PDF.

## Comparison: OCR-Extraction vs. AWS Textract / Google Cloud Vision
| Feature | OCR-Extraction.com | AWS Textract / Google Cloud OCR |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Cost** | **Free Forever** | Expensive (Pay-per-page) |
| **Setup** | **None (Browser-based)** | Complex API Setup |
| **Account** | **No Account Needed** | Account & Credit Card Required |
| **Focus** | **End-User / Docs / Tables** | Developer / API Integration |

## Common Use Cases
- **Students & Researchers**: Convert scanned books and notes to text for free.
- **Business**: Extract tables from invoices to Excel without expensive software.
- **Privacy-Conscious**: Process sensitive documents without permanent cloud storage.
